sections.heading: Privacy Policy Statement
content: Your privacy is important to us. It is our policy to respect your privacy regarding any information we may collect from you across our website and related services.

sections.heading: Information Collection and Use
content: We only ask for personal information when necessary to provide a service to you. We collect it by fair and lawful means, with your knowledge and consent. We also let you know why we're collecting it and how it will be used.

sections.heading: Account Integrations
content: You may sign up using various integrations (e.g., social or email providers) so that your account details can be prefilled with information from these services.

sections.heading: Data Retention and Protection
content: We only retain collected information for as long as necessary to provide you with your requested service. Any stored data will be protected using commercially acceptable means to prevent loss and unauthorized access or modification.

sections.heading: Information Sharing
content: We will not share any personally identifying information publicly or with third parties, except when required by law.

sections.heading: Data Protection Role
content: We act as both a data controller and data processor with regard to personal data processed through our services, in compliance with applicable data protection laws.

sections.heading: External Site Links
content: Our website may link to external sites that are not operated by us. Please be aware that we have no control over the content and practices of these sites and cannot accept responsibility for their respective privacy policies.

sections.heading: Refusal of Information
content: You are free to refuse our request for your personal information, although this may limit our ability to provide certain services.

sections.heading: Acceptance of Privacy Practices
content: Your continued use of our website indicates your acceptance of our practices regarding privacy and personal information. If you have any questions about how we handle user data, please feel free to contact us.
